text: Nieuwerbrug is a village in the Dutch province of South Holland. It is a part of the former municipality of Bodegraven, and lies about five kilometres west of Woerden. Bodegraven has made part of the new municipality of Bodegraven- Reeuwijk since 2011. In 2001, the village of Nieuwerbrug had 978 inhabitants. The built-up area of the village was 0.16 km², and contained 358 residences.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Bevolkingskernen in Nederland 2001. (Statistics are for the continuous built-up area). ==References== Category:Bodegraven-Reeuwijk Category:Populated places in South Holland
title: Nieuwerbrug
